Last but not least, I'd like to remind everyone that the G2 8th Ladies All Star will be held from Tuesday, February 20th to Sunday, February 25th at Boat Race Miwako.
This is my favorite Ladies' race, where all professional racers are women!
The Ladies All Star is one of the four major women's races, and it is held only for female racers selected by fan votes and by a committee.
There's a fan vote and all that. Oh, yeah. Here are the top six.
They're all very famous. I know them all. Do you know them already?
Miho Moriya has a child, and I've been supporting her since before she went on maternity leave.
The first 12 races on the first day will be run by these six riders, and they're all very strong.
It's easy to see how the race will unfold... and the in-race margin of victory tends to be about 5 percent lower for the women.
It's hard for the first white boat to escape. Seriously, it's a very fun and interesting race exhibition, so I hope you'll watch it with me.
And one more thing I want to let you know is that if you buy a boat ticket at Boat Race Miho by phone, you usually get one oumi for every 100 yen you spend.
You can get a cash bag and various other privileges depending on the points you earn.
There is no membership fee and no annual fee, and the six ladies' all-star jumpers we signed this time are the prizes of the Oumi Point Club.
And now, six of our signed Ladies All-Star jumpers will be featured as giveaways in the Oumi Points Club! I wrote that!
Please check the Oumi Point Club website in the overview section for more details.
